keyFacts: The invoice details multiple shipments made by Jeffrey E. Epstein using FedEx services.
The total charges for the invoice amount to $941.42.
Several individuals are noted as senders or recipients of packages associated with Epstein.
The document includes specific dates of package pickups and deliveries.
There are indications of discounts applied to the shipping charges.
